name: Lycanroc Midday Form
description: The Wolf Pokémon. The sharp rocks in its mane can cut like knives. Lycanroc wears its prey down by degrees before finishing them off.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage, and its speed is doubled in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when this Pokémon fails a saving throw against a negative condition, it can choose to pass instead.
